attributes.additional_details: He has made very bad decisions for Wales and the people of wales are fed-up with his bad politics and wasting public tax payer's money on the 20mph speed limit 33 million that could of gone in to the nhs
attributes.background: We want you to remove the first  minister fro. Office in wales

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes asking for Ministers to resign.

In any case, the issue you raise in the text of your petition is something that the Welsh Government and Welsh Parliament (Senedd Cymru) are responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee. You can find out more here: https://petitions.senedd.wales/

You may also wish to raise this issue with your local Members of the Senedd who represent you. You can find out who your Members of the Senedd are and how to contact them here: https://senedd.wales/find-a-member-of-the-senedd/
